name: DO NOT PUSH: Test sys_class_name Auto-Add
script:
// Test script to verify sys_class_name gets auto-added
gs.info('Test job executed successfully with sys_class_name: ' + current.sys_class_name);
short_description: Test record to verify sys_class_name auto-addition
description: This job tests that sys_class_name gets automatically added as 'sysauto_script' when a script is provided.
